title: Lakshmi Kasu Mala Pendant - Radiant Ruby & Diamond Centerpiece
features: Intricately designed filigree work with delicate floral motifs. The centerpiece features a domed Ruby cabochon encircled by sparkling diamonds, creating a captivating focal point. The floral pattern showcases fine craftsmanship. Perfect for adding to a traditional South Indian Kasu Mala. Modern design with traditional inspirations.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing the best of Hyderabadi jewelry traditions. The striking ruby and diamond combination symbolizes love, prosperity, and new beginnings. A valuable heirloom piece to be treasured for generations, adding a touch of South Indian heritage to any outfit.
